channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Democrats Confirm Abortion Extremism By Blocking Protections For Babies Born Alive After Botched Abortions
item.description: Many of the same senators who voted against the born-alive bill on Wednesday proudly filibustered it in 2020.

item.title: House Republican works to turn Trump's DEI ban into law

item.title: New GOP Sen. Ashley Moody Throws Support Behind Pete Hegseth’s Pentagon Nomination
item.description: The full Senate could vote on Hegseth's nomination as early as Friday.

item.title: Trump says he'll call on Saudi Arabia to lower oil prices
item.description: President Trump wants oil prices to drop, saying such a move could end the Russia-Ukraine war.

item.title: The Forgotten Victims of Government Overreach
item.description: When the state comes after ordinary citizens, too many must endure long waits and arduous legal proceedings to secure justice — if they get it at all.

item.title: If The U.S. Government Doesn’t Ban TikTok, Parents Should
item.description: Threats to national security aside, apps like TikTok are bad for people and should therefore be banned or highly regulated.

item.title: Perfection in Houston, Courtesy of the Menil Collection
item.description: Or, near perfection, since I’d ditch its DEI hogwash.

item.title: How California’s Mismanagement of Fire and Water Makes Wildfires Worse
item.description: There are systemic failures going back many years, which have combined to undermine California’s ability to prepare for and respond to fires.

item.title: Congress Must Compel Trump to Enforce the TikTok Law
item.description: The Senate should decline to confirm his appointees if he is obstinate in declining to execute the law.

item.title: Newsom And Bass’s Only Hope For Avoiding Recalls Is A Global Warming Blame Game
item.description: Epic incompetence from Democrats can only be excused by blaming the California fires on a sinful mankind that is changing the climate.

item.title: Report: Trump Will Pardon Pro-Lifers Imprisoned By Biden’s Radical Abortion Regime
item.description: Trump is poised to fulfill his promise to get pro-lifers 'out of the gulags.'

item.title: Trump’s Magnificent Blow Against DEI
item.description: To its great credit, the Trump administration is pointing to a more just and fair future.
